changePassword.descriptionHasPassword: Enter your current password and choose a new one
changePassword.newPasswordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
changePassword.newPasswordPattern: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number

profile.fileSizeError: File size must be less than 10MB
profile.fileTypeError: File must be JPEG, PNG, WebP, or GIF

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
forgotPassword.emailSentSuccess: Password reset email has been sent! Please check your inbox.

register.title: Create an account
register.description: Enter your email and password to get started
register.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
register.passwordPattern: Password must contain uppercase, lowercase and number
register.successMessage: Registration successful! Please check your email to verify your account

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
resetPassword.passwordPattern: Password must contain uppercase, lowercase and number

verifyEmail.error: An error occurred during email verification
verifyEmail.successMessage: Your email has been verified successfully!
verifyEmail.title: Email Verification
verifyEmail.checkEmailLink: Please check the verification link in your email

sessions.title: Active Sessions
sessions.description: Manage your active login sessions across different devices
sessions.logoutDeviceConfirmDescription: This will terminate the session on this device
sessions.logoutAllConfirmDescription: This will logout all active sessions
sessions.logoutAllSuccess: All other devices logged out successfully

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for could not be found

editProfile.title: Edit Profile
editProfile.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters
editProfile.usernamePattern: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
